law.catch_line: Meetings of Commission and advisory boards.

text.section: The Commission and any advisory boards or committees of the Commission shall hold regular meetings between and during sessions of the General Assembly.

The Commission is authorized to call meetings of any advisory board or committee of the Commission, and require a comprehensive written report concerning the activities of such committee or advisory board.

law.history: Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 91, sec. 9, effectiveJune 16, 1966.
